text: Pedro Antonio García Villa (born January 26, 1973 in Murcia) is a 5-per-team football player from Spain. He has a disability: he is blind. He played 5-per- team football at the 2004 Summer Paralympics. His team finished third after they played Greece and, won 2-0. == References == Category:Spanish footballers Category:Living people Category:1973 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:People from the Region of Murcia Category:Spanish 5-per-team footballers
title: Pedro Antonio García Villa
